website_summaries.verdict: Sharp-looking bike aimed at pre-teen riders. Lightweight frame works great for kids.
pros: Perfect for young riders looking for a first multi-speed bike
Features a smaller frame of 14.75 inches (measured center to center)
Offers a 21-speed road bike with a Shimano derailleur and shifting system that deliver a great level of performance
cons: Not large enough to work with large children or adults

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Great option to get the little ones on the road. The low price meant there were some low quality parts, but with some new bars, shifter/brake levers and some road tires, the cost was still less than other bikes, and my kids both could ride 16mph all day. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: N. Haskovec

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 & 10 year old boys love this bike! Is also great sporty looking! As always ... Thank you to Amazon & to the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Chayo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble Bicycle
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bike, bought for my 11 year-old son. Very, very well packaged and arrived before estimated delivery date, so everyone was happy. Very easy to assemble: pedals, seat, handle bars, and drink holder were all that needed to be installed. Brakes and gear-changer worked right out of the box -- the easiest bike I have had to assemble in years. All around a great deal, well deserving of 5 stars and this review. Will make my next bicycle purchase exactly the same way.
customer_reviews.author: D. B.

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 bike
customer_reviews.text: Great bike really smooth tires are nice and skinny so there very lite but also provide great traction frame is light allowing for great speed and the gears change just as smooth if not smoother than my trek road bike. 10/10 bike I would recommend it to any biker who is just starting out . Have fun riding and be safe!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very good bike but hand brakes are hard for small hands ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good bike but hand brakes are hard for small hands to operate . Will have to change brake levers.
customer_reviews.author: Randy R.

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The bike was delivered quite fast, easy to assemble. Just the right size for my 12 year old son. He loves this bike.
customer_reviews.author: douglas broome

customer_reviews.title: Good basic starter bike
customer_reviews.text: Good basic starter bike. We purchased it for our 10-year old who has expressed interest in racing and are happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Liese M. Zitzkat

customer_reviews.title: I love this bike
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike. I compete in triathlons and go for 20 mile rides and bike is in great condition still.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Breaks are to hard for a kid. Aside from that all good
customer_reviews.author: Carlos GCV

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful appearance, easy to install, fine workmanship, easy cycling
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: On to happy riding!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived beat up and bent by the delivery service. After a run to the repair shop it was fixed. On to happy riding!
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Great bike.
customer_reviews.text: Great bike..bought it for my 9 year old daughter..she loves it..she's around 4' 3" and she can just put her toes on the ground when stopped..need to get new break pads..and may get a straight bar..other than that all around great bike..and fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly as ordered
customer_reviews.text: Bike is easy to install. However, the bike does not have red trim; it is pink trim, especially the handle bars and the foot pedals.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Bike shop says its worst bike ever but its my bike so I defended ...
customer_reviews.text: I have put 40 miles on the bike and the bearings on the front fork came out, the handlebar tape unravelled and the gears started jumping. Bike shop says its worst bike ever but its my bike so I defended my choice....
customer_reviews.author: Christopher V. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: It's a KIDS bike!! 24" wheels, not frame.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bike thinking it was a 24 inch frame, but found it that it was a KIDS BIKE! With 24 inch wheels!! Had to return...
customer_reviews.author: Chantel

customer_reviews.title: Amazon blew it!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! The bike itself is fine, ordered one with a 24" frame and received a 17" frame instead. I look like a gorilla on a tricycle! Can't return it because it will cost more than the bike itself. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: jesse furumo

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for two hundred dollars not bad at all to small but for the moment is ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for two hundred dollars not bad at all to small but for the moment is okay until I buy a new and bigger size .
customer_reviews.author: Jose Antonio Sanabria

customer_reviews.title: Good so far.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good haven't even road it a mile yet. I bought it on eBay. Setup was simple fork wasn't backwards like some people said. Bike shop told me it's gonna fall apart easily couse it's cheap but the bike fits me as I'm a short guy at 5'3 and it's perfect. I might want to upgrade to longer pedals and other components but like I said I just bought couse the bike is a fit for me and it's really light to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value but a fee broken pieces under 100 miles.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it seems like a good way to try the sport. I've put less sthan a hundred miles on it an had one flat seems like the tube was defective near the stem. Also the Seat broke...The plastic that holds one of the bars broke. The warranty says I have to pay shipping so I'll probably just buy a better seat. I'll call Monday to see if that's true since at 190 lbs this can't be normal.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: It was my fist road bike and I loved it
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: good luck reaching the breaks
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! Components are cheaper/less quality than described. The handlebars are mens so unless you have monkey arms, good luck reaching the breaks. I mean come on... at least put a womens bar on it to even things out. I have brought it into 4 different bike shops thought out town and all of them have basically laughed and said that this is the worst road bike they have ever seen. DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Terasa

customer_reviews.title: Do not get
customer_reviews.text: So when I got the bike it had the fork on backwards it has a mountain bike tube inside the tire and I hurt my self really badly in a accident. It has very crapy breaks. Very very bad shifting do not get!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bike
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike It has a nice ride It is vary derable
customer_reviews.author: reese

product_meta.title: GMC Denali Road Boys Bike, 24-Inch
product_meta.description: The GMC Denali 21-Speed Road Bike is built around a lightweight aluminum road bike frame for racing or commuting. You'll stop on a dime with the alloy calipers and brake levers and the high-profile alloy Vitesse racing rims look as good as they perform. The Shimano derailleur and Shimano Revo shifts make it easy to change gears quickly and smoothly and the high-performance tires are up to the challenge of rigorous street racing. Lastly, this road bike will help you stay hydrated with the included alloy water bottle cage.
feature_bullets: Best suited for smaller riders. Age Range: 9 - 12 years
21-speed road bike features a lightweight aluminum frame
Alloy calipers and alloy brake levers
Shimano derailleur and Shimano Revo shifts makes it easy to change gears quickly and smoothly
Frame Size- 14.75inches(measured center to center) Effective Top Tube- 18.75inchesStand Over Clearance at the center of the top tube- 26.75inches
